Source: Enables a text size setting in the in-game menu and app-shell device preferences page that scales text according to a user's selection.
en-us: Enables a text size setting in the in-game menu and app-shell device preferences page that scales text according to a user's selection.

Source: Very early preview for syncing Scripts with files on disk. Not ready for full workflows, please read the DevForum post linked before enabling.
en-us: Very early preview for syncing Scripts with files on disk. Not ready for full workflows, please read the DevForum post linked before enabling.

Source: Adds ragdoll constraints into avatars. Also replaces Motor6Ds with AnimationConstraints, which play animations either kinematically or with physical simulation.
en-us: Adds ragdoll constraints into avatars. Also replaces Motor6Ds with AnimationConstraints, which play animations either kinematically or with physical simulation.

Source: Details are shown on selected constraints even without the global Constraint Details enabled. Constraints appear translucent through occluding objects.
en-us: Details are shown on selected constraints even without the global Constraint Details enabled. Constraints appear translucent through occluding objects.

Source: Enable the terrain upgrade changing the way voxels are rendered to make them much smoother in cases where there were terracing issues and LOD artefacts before. (NOTE: Requires Upgrade Shorelines!)
en-us: Enable the terrain upgrade changing the way voxels are rendered to make them much smoother in cases where there were terracing issues and LOD artefacts before. (NOTE: Requires Upgrade Shorelines!)

Source: Beta Feature is in Invalid State
en-us: Beta Feature is in Invalid State

Context: Studio is in a potentially invalid state, and should be restarted to ensure propper functionality
Source: New Icons / DPI Aware Studio Beta Feature has been changed, and requires a restart to take effect.
en-us: New Icons / DPI Aware Studio Beta Feature has been changed, and requires a restart to take effect.

Source: Failed to load beta features from cloud: %1
en-us: Failed to load beta features from cloud: %1

Context: reload because BFs loaded from cloud
Source: Beta features enabled for this account differ from those saved locally. Updated Beta features will not be available until you restart Studio.
en-us: Beta features enabled for this account differ from those saved locally. Updated Beta features will not be available until you restart Studio.

Source: Would you like to restart Studio now?
en-us: Would you like to restart Studio now?

Source: Beta features will not be activated until you restart Studio
en-us: Beta features will not be activated until you restart Studio

Source: Enables Sound Instances that are children of Cylinder, Block, and Ball parts to emit audio from every point on the surface of the part, rather than only the center.
en-us: Enables Sound Instances that are children of Cylinder, Block, and Ball parts to emit audio from every point on the surface of the part, rather than only the center.

Source: Enables the AI Material Generator, which allows you to generate any PBR material you can imagine using text input.
en-us: Enables the AI Material Generator, which allows you to generate any PBR material you can imagine using text input.

Context: Terms and conditions for being able to use the AI Material Generator
Source:
Material Generator is a tool provided by Roblox as an option to access material creation features in Studio. BY PROCEEDING OR USING MATERIAL GENERATOR, YOU ACCEPT AND AGREE TO THE BELOW.

You remain responsible for ensuring that all language, data and other information that you upload to Roblox, and all images and other materials suggested by Material Generator, complies with the Roblox Terms of Use (the “Terms”) including the Roblox Community Standards. Material Generator is part of the “Services” as defined in the Terms. Accordingly, your use of Material Generator is subject to the Terms, including the Creator Terms and the Roblox Community Standards, and, among other things, you must (i) use Material Generator in a lawful manner and in compliance with all applicable laws, (ii) not reverse engineer, disassemble, decompile, or otherwise attempt to derive or gain access to Material Generator; and (iii) use Material Generator in a manner that does not infringe or attempt to infringe, misappropriate or otherwise violate any rights of Roblox or any other person or entity.

Due to its nature, Material Generator may generate irrelevant, inaccurate, offensive, or other material that is not useful for your purposes and that may be the same, similar, or different among users. Material Generator is not intended to provide factual information or advice. YOUR USE OF MATERIAL GENERATOR IS AT YOUR OWN RISK, AND MATERIAL GENERATOR IS PROVIDED “AS IS” AND WITHOUT CONDITION, WARRANTY, GUARANTEE OR REPRESENTATION OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED (INCLUDING WITHOUT LIMITATION, ANY WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, TITLE, NON-INFRINGEMENT, AVAILABILITY, OR ERROR-FREE OR UNINTERRUPTED USE). ROBLOX MAKES NO WARRANTY ABOUT CONTENT OR MATERIALS ACCESSIBLE THROUGH OR FROM MATERIAL GENERATOR, AND EXPRESSLY DISCLAIMS THAT ANY CONTENT, IMAGES OR INFORMATION RESULTING FROM OR RELATED TO YOUR USE OF MATERIAL GENERATOR IS ACCURATE OR RELIABLE OR CAN OR SHOULD BE RELIED UPON BY YOU FOR ANY PURPOSE.

Source: Enables a new selection outline style, the ability to select objects that are behind other objects, a new option for showing bounding boxes, and a context menu item for selecting parents of objects.
en-us: Enables a new selection outline style, the ability to select objects that are behind other objects, a new option for showing bounding boxes, and a context menu item for selecting parents of objects.

Source: Select folder to save Roblox documents
en-us: Select folder to save Roblox documents

Source:
Need a location to store local files.
Do you want to pick a file path now?
en-us:
Need a location to store local files.
Do you want to pick a file path now?

Source: Animation clip editor will have a "Live Animation Creator" option in the Import menu to transfer 3D pose from a video to an avatar.
en-us: Animation clip editor will have a "Live Animation Creator" option in the Import menu to transfer 3D pose from a video to an avatar.

Source: New Instance type DragDetector that enables click-drag-release interactions. Enabling this beta feature allows using DragDetectors only within Roblox Studio.
en-us: New Instance type DragDetector that enables click-drag-release interactions. Enabling this beta feature allows using DragDetectors only within Roblox Studio.

Source: Quality of life improvements to the existing constraint tool that utilizes the new dragger improvements. Enabling this beta feature will automatically enable the 'Dragger QoL Improvements' beta feature.
en-us: Quality of life improvements to the existing constraint tool that utilizes the new dragger improvements. Enabling this beta feature will automatically enable the 'Dragger QoL Improvements' beta feature.

Source: Many small quality of life improvements to the core Studio draggers. See the DevForum announcement for a full list of what's been changed.
en-us: Many small quality of life improvements to the core Studio draggers. See the DevForum announcement for a full list of what's been changed.

Source: Animation Editor will have a "Face Capture" button to use a camera to record your own face movements onto an avatar.
en-us: Animation Editor will have a "Face Capture" button to use a camera to record your own face movements onto an avatar.

Source: Script analysis uses non-strict mode for all scripts by default. Use --!strict, --!nonstrict or --!nocheck to override mode on a per script basis.
en-us: Script analysis uses non-strict mode for all scripts by default. Use --!strict, --!nonstrict or --!nocheck to override mode on a per script basis.

Source: Script analysis uses the new Luau type inference engine and type checker. Yields better error messages.
en-us: Script analysis uses the new Luau type inference engine and type checker. Yields better error messages.

Source: Use Accessory Fitting Tool to edit caged clothing items as well as rigid accessories.
en-us: Use Accessory Fitting Tool to edit caged clothing items as well as rigid accessories.

Source: Enable tools to create a Roblox Classic experience (R15 experience that plays like an R6).
en-us: Enable tools to create a Roblox Classic experience (R15 experience that plays like an R6).

Source: Enable tools to convert an R6 experience to R15. These include tools to convert characters, animations, and scripts from R6 to R15.
en-us: Enable tools to convert an R6 experience to R15. These include tools to convert characters, animations, and scripts from R6 to R15.

Source: Enable the FaceControls instance which supports facial animation for avatars that have a dynamic-head.
en-us: Enable the FaceControls instance which supports facial animation for avatars that have a dynamic-head.

Source: ProximityPrompt is a new instance type used to prompt the user for input so they can interact with an object in the 3D world.
en-us: ProximityPrompt is a new instance type used to prompt the user for input so they can interact with an object in the 3D world.

Source: Adaptively take larger timesteps for individual solver islands when possible.
en-us: Adaptively take larger timesteps for individual solver islands when possible.

Source: When typechecking scripts, incorporate the shape of the game's DataModel
en-us: When typechecking scripts, incorporate the shape of the game's DataModel

Source: Enable Accelerated Collision Detection which improves collision performance for large assemblies.
en-us: Enable Accelerated Collision Detection which improves collision performance for large assemblies.

Source: Enable a different algorithm for avatar Inner Box collision box sizing and positioning using margins around RigAttachment extents.
en-us: Enable a different algorithm for avatar Inner Box collision box sizing and positioning using margins around RigAttachment extents.

Source: Enable the new smart, unified Avatar and Mesh Importer
en-us: Enable the new smart, unified Avatar and Mesh Importer

Source: Enables the new particle flipbook feature, allowing the use of animated textures on particles (needing a 1024x1024 grid-layout texture of individiual frames).
en-us: Enables the new particle flipbook feature, allowing the use of animated textures on particles (needing a 1024x1024 grid-layout texture of individiual frames).

Source: This beta feature allows creators to incorporate aerodynamic forces on parts and their assemblies. Once enabled, creators will have access to the workspace enum 'FluidForces' allowing them to opt-into this new force model via toggling it to 'Experimental'. This feature also exposes the workspace property 'AirDensity', and the BasePart property 'EnableFluidForces' in the Studio UI.
en-us: This beta feature allows creators to incorporate aerodynamic forces on parts and their assemblies. Once enabled, creators will have access to the workspace enum 'FluidForces' allowing them to opt-into this new force model via toggling it to 'Experimental'. This feature also exposes the workspace property 'AirDensity', and the BasePart property 'EnableFluidForces' in the Studio UI.

Source: Enable calculating masses for Mesh Parts and CSG Operations based on their Mesh instead of their Collision Fidelity. Old Mesh Parts and CSG Operations will not be affected until you change their Collision Fidelity.
en-us: Enable calculating masses for Mesh Parts and CSG Operations based on their Mesh instead of their Collision Fidelity. Old Mesh Parts and CSG Operations will not be affected until you change their Collision Fidelity.

Source: This beta feature improves the robustness and performance of CSG operations in Studio. These improvements are enabled when using the Solid modeling tools (Union, Intersect, Negate, Separate) or plugins that leverage the legacy CSG operation APIs (BasePart).
en-us: This beta feature improves the robustness and performance of CSG operations in Studio. These improvements are enabled when using the Solid modeling tools (Union, Intersect, Negate, Separate) or plugins that leverage the legacy CSG operation APIs (BasePart).

Source: Enable native code generation for Luau modules tagged with --!native.
en-us: Enable native code generation for Luau modules tagged with --!native.

Source: New experiences created in Studio are immediately saved to Roblox and have Team Create enabled by default.
en-us: New experiences created in Studio are immediately saved to Roblox and have Team Create enabled by default.

Context: The name of the Shift key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the Caps Lock key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the Control key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the MacOS Command key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the Option key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the Backspace key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.
The name of the Tab key, as it would appear on the user's keyboard.

Source: A new UI object that renders descendants as a single layer that can be tinted and made transparent.
en-us: A new UI object that renders descendants as a single layer that can be tinted and made transparent.

Source: Pathfinding link can be used to connect areas in the place which otherwise are unconnected.
en-us: Pathfinding link can be used to connect areas in the place which otherwise are unconnected.

Source: Allow plugins to access the ScriptEditorService and ScriptDocument objects, permitting them to interact with an active editor.
en-us: Allow plugins to access the ScriptEditorService and ScriptDocument objects, permitting them to interact with an active editor.

Source: A new "Collaborate" button that enables you to immediately add, view, or manage collaborators and their permissions for your game. If collaborators are added, Team Create is turned on so that you can work together with your friends.
en-us: A new "Collaborate" button that enables you to immediately add, view, or manage collaborators and their permissions for your game. If collaborators are added, Team Create is turned on so that you can work together with your friends.

Source: Add new emulation devices with non-rectangular aka "notched" screens.
en-us: Add new emulation devices with non-rectangular aka "notched" screens.

Source: Search by properties, tags, parents, and more.
en-us: Search by properties, tags, parents, and more.

Source: AI-Powered code completion in Studio Script Editor. Based on existing script and/or comments, AI code suggestion will be triggered automatically.
en-us: AI-Powered code completion in Studio Script Editor. Based on existing script and/or comments, AI code suggestion will be triggered automatically.

Source: Enable an experimental AI-powered Assistant to help you create experiences faster by answering questions, generating and explaining code, and creating new materials.
en-us: Enable an experimental AI-powered Assistant to help you create experiences faster by answering questions, generating and explaining code, and creating new materials.

Source: Outer layers of multilayer outfits will fit better with less distortion. Single layer outfits will be unaffected. Also faster.
en-us: Outer layers of multilayer outfits will fit better with less distortion. Single layer outfits will be unaffected. Also faster.

Source: Tags for selected instances can now be added and removed from the properties panel.
en-us: Tags for selected instances can now be added and removed from the properties panel.

Source: Import UGC bodies and heads, preview them with the Avatar Previewer, and upload them to the Marketplace.
en-us: Import UGC bodies and heads, preview them with the Avatar Previewer, and upload them to the Marketplace.

Source: Enables video uploads through the Asset Manager for eligible users.
en-us: Enables video uploads through the Asset Manager for eligible users.

Source: A Lua based replacement for the default animate script and the built-in Humanoid State Machine that provides new built-in abilities and other enhancements to character movement over time. This beta adds a Lua State Machine, Lua Motion Compositor, and Lua Abilities framework to the default avatar along with a new movement ability - crouching. It also enhances existing locomotion with new animations and fidelity improvements such as foot-planting. These can be modified using the ability configuration settings via Lua and custom attributes.
en-us: A Lua based replacement for the default animate script and the built-in Humanoid State Machine that provides new built-in abilities and other enhancements to character movement over time. This beta adds a Lua State Machine, Lua Motion Compositor, and Lua Abilities framework to the default avatar along with a new movement ability - crouching. It also enhances existing locomotion with new animations and fidelity improvements such as foot-planting. These can be modified using the ability configuration settings via Lua and custom attributes.

Source: Enables a new modernized Roblox Menu and related APIs for more seamless UI placement of key system controls.
en-us: Enables a new modernized Roblox Menu and related APIs for more seamless UI placement of key system controls.

Source: Enables improved camera controls for Studio.
en-us: Enables improved camera controls for Studio.

Source: Enables the new EditableImage and EditableMesh instances which allow the runtime creation and editing of Images and Meshes
en-us: Enables the new EditableImage and EditableMesh instances which allow the runtime creation and editing of Images and Meshes

Source: Enables customization of terrain grass length in Studio.
en-us: Enables customization of terrain grass length in Studio.

Source: Enables new instances for customizing, processing, and routing sounds or voices within the engine
en-us: Enables new instances for customizing, processing, and routing sounds or voices within the engine

Source: New docking logic that allows undocking of the 3D Viewport and addresses docking corruption glitches and issues. Please note when enabled, this will start with a new layout. Your old layout will be restored if you disable this feature.
en-us: New docking logic that allows undocking of the 3D Viewport and addresses docking corruption glitches and issues. Please note when enabled, this will start with a new layout. Your old layout will be restored if you disable this feature.

Source: Improves UI and expands functionality of Studio Notifications
en-us: Improves UI and expands functionality of Studio Notifications

Source: Add flexible layout options to UIListLayout.
en-us: Add flexible layout options to UIListLayout.

Source: Updates the Terrain Editor with a new and improved UI.
en-us: Updates the Terrain Editor with a new and improved UI.

Source: Enables automated creation of avatars from single-mesh 3D models of humanoid-like bodies. Marketplace submission of auto-setup created avatars is enabled in this version.
en-us: Enables automated creation of avatars from single-mesh 3D models of humanoid-like bodies. Marketplace submission of auto-setup created avatars is enabled in this version.

Context: Terms and conditions for being able to use Avatar Auto-Setup
Source:
Please view the Terms and Conditions at the link below:

https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/articles/20121392440212
en-us:
Please view the Terms and Conditions at the link below:

https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/articles/20121392440212

Source: Streamlines Play Solo for faster loading performance.
en-us: Streamlines Play Solo for faster loading performance.

Source: Enables AI-powered texture generation for mesh parts in Studio.
en-us: Enables AI-powered texture generation for mesh parts in Studio.

Context: Terms and conditions for being able to use the AI Texture Generator
Source:
Please view the Terms and Conditions at the link below:

https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/articles/20121392440212
en-us:
Please view the Terms and Conditions at the link below:

https://en.help.roblox.com/hc/articles/20121392440212

Source: Enables visual pausing, stepping, and simulation debugging at studio run time.
en-us: Enables visual pausing, stepping, and simulation debugging at studio run time.

Source: Enables Unified lighting model which replaces Voxel, Shadowmap and Future by adjusting technology at runtime.
en-us: Enables Unified lighting model which replaces Voxel, Shadowmap and Future by adjusting technology at runtime.

Source: Adds a new Material button to the Home and Edit tabs to quickly change materials.
en-us: Adds a new Material button to the Home and Edit tabs to quickly change materials.

Source: New Instance type UIDragDetector that enables click-drag-release interactions for UI Elements. Enabling this beta feature allows adding and using UIDragDetectors only within Roblox Studio.
en-us: New Instance type UIDragDetector that enables click-drag-release interactions for UI Elements. Enabling this beta feature allows adding and using UIDragDetectors only within Roblox Studio.

Context: The title for the preview version of the "Next Gen Studio" feature
Description for the checkbox to enable the "Next Gen Studio" feature which updates many pieces of the core studio UI
Source: Enable the preview of Next Gen Studio core - introducing system menus, new categorization and look & feel of the top toolbar, upcoming customization features.
en-us: Enable the preview of Next Gen Studio core - introducing system menus, new categorization and look & feel of the top toolbar, upcoming customization features.

Context: The title for the "Next Gen Explorer" beta feature
Description for the checkbox to enable the "Next Gen Explorer" beta feature which updates the Explorer
Source: Enable the preview of the Next Gen Explorer - featuring better performance and a revamped UI
en-us: Enable the preview of the Next Gen Explorer - featuring better performance and a revamped UI

Context: The title for the "Next Gen Properties" beta feature
Description for the checkbox to enable the "Next Gen Properties" beta feature which updates the Properties Panel
Source: Enable the preview of the Next Gen Properties Panel - featuring better performance and a revamped UI
en-us: Enable the preview of the Next Gen Properties Panel - featuring better performance and a revamped UI

Source: SurfaceAppearance Tinting allows you to multiply a Color property with your SurfaceAppearance’s ColorMap to create color variations.
en-us: SurfaceAppearance Tinting allows you to multiply a Color property with your SurfaceAppearance’s ColorMap to create color variations.

Source: Enables the build tool in the Terrain Editor which allows for more intentional creation of large scale Terrain features.
en-us: Enables the build tool in the Terrain Editor which allows for more intentional creation of large scale Terrain features.

Source: Enable the bulk import of multiple 3D files through the Import 3D tool.
en-us: Enable the bulk import of multiple 3D files through the Import 3D tool.

Source: Enabling this feature allows you to simulate gamepad inputs directly in Roblox Studio without the need for physical controllers.
en-us: Enabling this feature allows you to simulate gamepad inputs directly in Roblox Studio without the need for physical controllers.
